item.title: Kommunistische Partei Deutschlands (KPD)
item.description: tags History Politics KPD election poster, 1932. The caption at the bottom reads ‘An end to this system!'. Figure 1: KPD election poster, 1932. The caption at the bottom reads ‘An end to this system!’. Related links # https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Communist%5FParty%5Fof%5FGermany
